block.p: KATZ-Louis, 93. Died on Monday, March 5. Born Podola, Poland, February 4, 1908, eldest son of Philip and Ida (Gleiber) Katz. Survived by wife Lillian Yacht Katz; son Dr. Joseph Katz and daughter Irene (Katz) Mahler and spouses. Stepson Philip Yacht, stepdaughter Ann (Yacht) Gorman and spouses. Grandfather of Matthew Katz, Leslie (Katz) Pucci, Seth and Jason Mahler, Andrew and Steven Yacht, and Craig Gorman. Brother of Abraham and Samuel Katz and Lena (Katz) Sequino. Funeral at Parkside Memorial Chapel, 98-60 Queens Boulevard, Queens, on Friday, March 9 at 12:45 PM. Shiva observed at Mahler home, West Hartford, CT. through Monday night. Memorials may be made to the Simon Wiesenthal Center, 9760 West Pico Boulevard, Los Angeles, California 90035.
